Package com.l2h1.tamagotchi.fragments

Class HomeFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.l2h1.tamagotchi.fragments.HomeFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.hardware.SensorEventListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HomeFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
Main fragment of the HouseActivity, displayed by default when the activity is created. This is the fragment displaying the entity's gauges. Only in this fragment are sensors activated when available (for step detection or shake detection).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

      private void updateProgressBars()
      Updates the display of ProgressBars according to the value of each entity state. The value of the ProgressBar itself and the text (TextView) displayed below it are updated.
